featured.text: They looked more fashionable in this way.
But pineapples can also be a fashionable fruit: Pineapple leaves can 21 a substitute for leather.

definition.zh_def: 時尚的；流行的，符合當前潮流的。
definition.en_def: In accordance with the current trends or styles; stylish.
definition.example: She always wears the most fashionable clothes.
